vsParam:
Verbena!
Here, this is the cloth you want~!

Wow, thank you so much.
But... I can't take your thing for nothing.

No, this is not OK.
Because, I was a pirate.

I don't take charity. But, it would be too boring
for a pirate to give you a reward directly.

Hmm... Hehe. You'd think of plundering
when speaking of pirates... right...?

Ah...
Verbena, your expression is way too horrific...!

Hehehehe. So, [px].
I'll use all my power to plunder that piece of cloth from you!

Hey, that's quite enough...
It's the 24th time...

No, I'm not going to lose!
I won't lose~!!

Hmm... Peppermint?
What on earth is going on here?

Ah, look~! Verbena wanted a piece of cloth,
and [px] made it for her.

And then Verbena said that
she'd plunder it from [px]...

Rock, paper, scissors!
Oh no~ I lost again~!

Drat, you're very good at this, [px]!
Oh... one more time! One more time... Ah, again please...!

Gee...
Verbena, you're so bad at rock-paper-scissors!

That's because... when we said "rock, paper",
she already reached out her hand...

Ah ha ha...
No wonder Verbena was known as an honest pirate...

She just loves playing rock-paper-scissors with
others... It's not plundering at all since she loses all the time...

Oh no! [px], one more time!
Last round, please~!! Last round~~!!
